item.title: Creepiest Half life Zombie?
item.dc:creator: Tacoez_Boy
item.description:
Armidale_Cheiron:

The scariest zombie for me is the Fast Zombies, especially when they come after me in packs of three and four. Unless you consider the part in Ep2 with the underground room of the abyss while waiting for the elevator… having your flashlight run out, then suddenly this red glowing grenade light pop up right next to me is enough to make me crap my pants (not literally).

Although on the other hand, I do have a zombie that pisses me off: the asshole who whacked the garden gnome across the room and sconned me in the side of the head. True story.

Its Ep1 sir

Read full topic

item.title: Creepiest Half life Zombie?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
Mont_Blanc:

How could he be more creepy and carry more poison headcrab other than the one on his head in that state ?

It could have one in the head and another in the back. After all it seems that the pain of their host doesn’t affect the headcrab to make them move it’s body. [COLOR=‘Black’]hell I couldn’t live without legs and keep crawling after getting burned

Mont_Blanc:

A genetic cross between a poison and fast zombie would be a pain tho.

:fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Creepiest Half life Zombie?
item.dc:creator: G-Rona
item.description:
mechaelite:

Ps: I’m just sure valve will shortly do a poison zombie torso and a zombine torso npc shortly. Then the poison torso will be the creepiest.

Poison torso? The damn thing is so hunched - it would be really hard to cut him in half. But yeah - shudder.

P.S. Could it still carry other headcrabs? Maybe not four, but … two, maybe.

Read full topic

item.title: Creepiest Half life Zombie?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
creepiest zombie? Poison.

The normal is just a stupid slow asshole, easy to kill.

The fast just scares you if you don’t see it coming.

The gonome made me take the shit out of it with the shotgun. It surprised me the first time for it’s ressistance and it’s speed.

The zombine is just… the most “intelligent” (it can say what it wants to say without reversing it’s victim voice, remember? “Biotics in the perimeter”, etc.) of the zombies. Nothing to worry about while it doesn’t use a grenade.

So yeah the poison definetly.

Ps: I’m just sure valve will shortly do a poison zombie torso and a zombine torso npc shortly. Then the poison torso will be the creepiest.

Read full topic

item.title: Creepiest Half life Zombie?
item.dc:creator: b737lvr
item.description:
Maxey:

I like to imagine that the infected human is fully aware of what’s going on but has no control over its actions.

i thought they were doing that already. Especially the normal zombie. the screams for help and icing give it away
